title: 106_hr2097
content: USS. New Jersey Commemorative Coin Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to mint and issue one-dollar silver coins in commemoration of the USS. New Jersey. Mandates that ten percent of all coin surcharges be paid to the USS. New Jersey Battleship Foundation in Middletown, New Jersey, for activities associated with the costs of moving the USS. New Jersey and permanently berthing her in her new location.
